sentences.sContent: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.sCn: 剑劈开了骑士的头盔并致命地刺进他。

sentences.sContent: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.sContent_eng: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.sCn: 相反，他叫女孩最后一次说她爱他，最后一次拥抱他，并让她戴上自己的头盔，因而，女孩可以幸免于难，而他自己却离开了人世……
